channel.title: How do i change the IP on trisidiaX V3 to get it online plz plz plz help
channel.description:
how do i change the IP on trisidiaX V3 to get it online plz plz plz help
hi i have the new trisidiax V3 and i need help changing the IP adress to get it online , now i'm not sure if you need to change it on the source and client or just source or just client ? im new to this so i dont know , but i would really appreciate if someone can help me with this , just like tell me where to open and where to go that will be enough..
thankyou very much..

item.title: How do i change the IP on trisidiaX V3 to get it online plz plz plz help
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Search in client files for trisidax
Open the files who show up

Ctrl+f then search trisidax
And simply replace all with yourservername.

Now go into singlink.java and replace the cachename which shud look like
.trisidax_cache_v3 and replace it to .your_cache_name

Then go to cachedownloader.java

Upload tpyour new cache name and replace the dl link in the cachedownloader.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change the IP on trisidiaX V3 to get it online plz plz plz help

petterrs96:

could anyone please tell me what i need to do to the client before i release it. add me on skype: Petter.rs or please post a link for a tutorial or something. :9 THANKS

just change server names, and cache download link, like upload your cache in dropbox and rename download link in client.java and autoCacheDownloader.java …

item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

client sided and search for client.java and then cntrl + f and then server =
Change it to 127.0.0.1
